title: Handrawn Blackletter?
content:
This looks hand drawn to me, is it?

If it is, what Blackletter font is it based on? I've tried comparing it, but the R seems to be different to most common ones.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818175722im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blackletter_4392.jpg)
author: smallfish
